post:
Hello.

Will be releasing a new VPS brand. Initially only offering HK VPS but will expand to Europe and USA if the feedback is positive.

This is not going to be life-time free VPS. So I would like to offer upto 10 free VPS on a single node for the sole purpose of testing the platform, performance and just getting a feel for general user experience.

Single test node has been deployed.

VMs will be as follows:

1GB RAM  
1vCPU  
40GB HDD  
KVM Hypervisor  
Bandwidth to be determined but around 200GB+/- for HK  
Price, also to be determined, but within LET pricing.  

Test period may last until the end of the year. Anyone interested?
